syntax = "proto3";

option (custom.description) = "One"
  "Two"
  "Three";
option (custom.long_description) = "First line of a long description. " // A
  "Second line continues here. " /*B*/
  "Third and final line."; // C
option (custom.single) = "Just one string";

message Foo {
  optional string name = 1;
}
